title: Something to add later
text: I am a marine ecology graduate student at Cal Poly Pomona in The Claisse Lab and currently developing my thesis. I am interested in quantitative marine research including fisheries, ecosystem based mangement, and anthropogenic effects on marine ecoysystems research. I have a broad range of experiences in education, research, and policy work spanning both coasts of the United States, Jamaica, the Dominican Republic, and in remote and urban settings. I enjoy projects that couple science with outreach and community engagement.

title: CV
text:
California Polytechnic University, Pomona | Pomona, CA Master’s in Biology | August 2022 - Present
St. John’s College | Annapolis MD B.A | August 2014 - May 2018
